name: angular-api-handler
description: An angular api handler for intercepting http requests

scripts.build: rm -rf aot dist && npm run ngc && npm run rollup && node ./scripts/copy-package
scripts.test: tsc && karma start karma.conf.js --single-run && npm run coverage-ts
scripts.publishPackage: npm run build && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.coverage-ts: remap-istanbul -i reports/coverage/json/coverage-final.json -o reports/coverage/html-ts -t html && remap-istanbul -i reports/coverage/json/coverage-final.json -o reports/coverage/json/coverage-remapped.json
